Introducing Inbox - Send or request money instantly while you chat with your friends. See all your order updates & personalised offers in your all new Inbox
Bug fixes and improvements.

Introducing Inbox - Send or request money instantly while you chat with your friends. See all your order updates & personalised offers in your all new Inbox
Bug fixes and improvements.

- Hello Siri. Now Siri will help you send money to your friends! Just mention how much and whom to send money to and it's done :)
- Introducing FASTag which allows you to zip through tolls without stopping.

-Movie Pass: Users can buy Moviepass and watch movies at 100% Cashback*. The offer is running in selected cities. With this feature, users can buy and redeem their passes in one tap. Also, real-time   tracking of the usage summary of the pass for each use

-Movie Pass: Users can buy Moviepass and watch movies at 100% Cashback*. The offer is running in selected cities. With this feature, users can buy and redeem their passes in one tap. Also, real-time   tracking of the usage summary of the pass for each use

We have revamped our UPI Money Transfer. It is now the fastest way to send money to anyone’s bank account. Do check the new experience and share your feedback

Movies - Now see your favourite cinemas upfront based on your past bookings
Trains - Track your PNR & check Live Train status

- Track all your previous UPI Money Transfer transactions made to your saved contacts. Right swipe on saved accounts in Money Transfer to use this feature
- Under the hood im
